title: Chapter 4592 - Chapter 4592: Invincible 1,4591
body:
Chapter 4592 - Chapter 4592: Invincible 1,4591

Chapter 4592: Invincible 1,4591

In the chaotic void, there was an extremely terrifying dragon claw. It covered more than 1,000 heaven’s origin powerhouses.

Faced with this terrifying Dragon Claw, they did not have the ability to resist.

They did not have the ability to resist at all.

Even the leader of the eight directions, who had just broken through, could not resist it.

This move of Wang Xian could be said to be his full strength.

The powerful power of time, including all of his strength.

That was how he was able to achieve this step.

However, this step was terrifying, terrifying!

It was equivalent to suppressing an entire region with one hand!

“We are trapped!”

“Master of the eight directions, what should we do? What should we do?”

“I don’t know either. This huge hand is too terrifying. Even the surrounding chaotic space has been sealed. Even powerful treasures and escape treasures have lost their effectiveness!”

“What exactly have we encountered? This is definitely not an attack that can be released by living beings. Absolutely Not!”

The extremely terrifying dragon claws completely enveloped all the great beings in the eight regions.

They could not break free at all.

They wanted to escape, but there was no way they could escape.

It was as if the area covered by the Dragon Claws was the entire world.

In this place, all laws and everything had disappeared.

Following that, they felt a terrifying power of chaos surging into their bodies.

“Not good!”

“It’s over. I feel like I’m being corroded by Chaos. The energy in my body is rapidly decreasing!”

“I can’t resist it. I can’t resist it at all!”

At this moment, they could feel their bodies being corroded. They could feel their strength rapidly decreasing.

At this moment, they were extremely terrified.

Although each of them could be resurrected.

However, the despair that made them suffocate, the despair that they hadn’t even met their opponent, made their bodies tremble.

Each of them had their strength suppressed by more than 90% .

Soon after, they felt that terrifying hand begin to move them.

This caused the hearts of all the experts in the eight regions to sink.

In front of the river of chaos, in front of the wedding stage, all the experts and disciples in the torrent region were completely stunned.

A black hole was opened with a single hand.

A single hand covered the entire eight regions and grabbed more than a thousand Tianyuan Wheel of fortune experts.

This was the area of the eight directions.

It was a powerful force that invaded them.

It was a powerful force that caused their flood region to defend for more than 200 million years, yet they were forced to retreat.

But now, Wang Lanjiang, Wang yinyin, and the others, this mysterious father, with just one hand, had captured all the experts in the area of the eight directions.

The other party didn’t even have the power to defend!

What kind of power was this.

What kind of invincibility was this!

How could there be such a powerful existence in the universe?

Wang Lanjiang and the others were also dumbstruck as they watched this scene.

They knew that their father was very powerful. In their region, he was an invincible existence.

All the experts in the universe had to curry favor and submit.

But they didn’t expect that their father was actually so powerful, so terrifying.

A terrifying hand came out of the black hole and grabbed all the strong practitioners in the eight-sided area.

The hand began to shrink as if it was in control of another universe!

“Eight-sided area, from today onwards, get out of the torrent area immediately. You are not allowed to invade the torrent area. Anyone who disobeys will be annihilated!”

Wang Xian grabbed all the strong practitioners in the eight-sided area. Through the gray hand, all the strong practitioners in the eight-sided area could see the outside clearly.

All of them stared blankly at the mysterious powerhouse who held them in his hand. They looked at the disciples of the powerhouses in the surrounding torrent region.

They were in a Daze!

They couldn’t believe it.

Until now, they still couldn’t believe that they were captured by a powerhouse.

They had a total of more than a thousand powerhouses in the Heaven’s origin realm.

However, they were captured by a large hand from the distant chaotic space.

What realm was this.

This was especially so for the leader of the eight directions. He had just broken through and was above the chaos realm.

He thought he was invincible!

He thought he was the supreme existence.

In the end, he was like an ant that could be crushed to death by that mysterious powerhouse?

This made him somewhat unable to believe it!

Wang Xian looked at his children with a smile. His gaze landed on Wang Lanjiang. “This is considered a wedding gift for you, Boss. In the future, the torrent region will not be invaded by the eight directions region.”

As he spoke, he clenched his terrifying dragon claws slightly.

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

An extremely dull energy surged out from the huge hand. All the experts in the eight regions were dead.

They didn’t even manage to utter a single word.

“Father, you… you are actually so powerful?”Wang Lanjiang looked at him with a face full of shock. “This is the first time I’ve seen you fight.”

Wang Xian smiled. “Your strength has improved quite well. What other gifts do you want? You can tell me.”

“Father, I don’t want anything either.”Wang Lanjiang shook his head. After regaining his memory, he knew that he didn’t lack anything and didn’t need anything.

“HMM, alright then. Let’s continue with the wedding. Don’t miss this auspicious day.”

Wang Xian smiled and said to them.

“Yes, Father!”

Wang Lanjiang nodded happily.

The rest of the children were also very happy.

“Let’s continue with the wedding. Sirs, please take a seat over here!”

The three chaos-level powerhouses from the torrent region spoke with their eyes wide open. Their faces were filled with respect.

The scene just now had given them too much of a shock!

Destroying all the experts from the entire region with a single hand.

The other party wanted to destroy their torrent region, so it was naturally easy for them.

However, at this moment, the three primal chaos realm existences were extremely excited and excited.

This lord’s children, Wang Lanjiang and the others had trained in their torrent region for over 200 million years.

They had formed a deep friendship with their torrent region.

In the future, wouldn’t their torrent region have an invincible backer?

Especially the primal chaos realm experts of upper nine, their faces were filled with excitement.

Gongsun Ying ‘er was his descendant, and now that she had become this lord’s daughter-in-law, who would dare to provoke them in the future?

In the future, their upper nine would be passed down forever!

The three great experts of the torrent region were very happy, and the other experts were even more excited.

Not to mention the disciples.

The wedding continued.

At this moment, everyone’s faces revealed even more excitement and happiness.

This was especially so when they received news from some of the powerful disciples at the front lines not long after.

They received news that all the powerful disciples in the eight regions had begun to retreat.

The universe they occupied had also been abandoned.
